dateline.placeName: OFFICE OF ALL THE YEAR ROUND,

body.p: I am always delighted when I can find promise in a new aspirant.CD used Gleig as an intermediary to communicate with Amelia Edwards, who contributed ‘Picking up Terrible Company’ to ‘Tom Tiddler's Ground’. See Pilgrim Letters 9, p. 455 (To Gleig, 16 September 1861). Pray do me the favor to address the Ghost story to me personally, here. You may rely upon my reading it myself and giving it my best and earliest attention.
